short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly view Sinhala meaning  of English words by hovering over them or searching directly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LKTips is a user-friendly Chrome extension that provides Sinhala meanings for English words. You can easily look up word meanings by hovering over or double-clicking on a word while browsing the web. Additionally, the extension now includes a search feature with autocomplete, allowing users to type English words to get their Sinhala meanings instantly. Ideal for bilingual users, students, and professionals who need quick translations while navigating content online!
